resources.string: Our new player originates from a wild experiment: could we make a player that is ten times smaller than the others, yet solves the myriad problems specific to the media industry?

Our improved live streaming aims to solve the three common use cases having different requirements from the platform. For example, AMedia uses Flowplayer to broadcast over 100 sports events every day.

Our new advertising solution is based on ad schedules that greatly simplify the complexity around ads. According to Stampen media this is "the most important addition in their toolbox" and they were able to increase ad revenue just by having all the ad stuff in their right places.
Our improved analytics put more emphasis on how the viewers initially engaged with the video after it was published.
